meaning: to stand someone up, to flake, to bail on someone

examples.chinese: 你既然知道他之前有愛放人家鴿子的習慣了，為什麼還要約他出來呢？
examples.translation: You know he has a habit of standing people up, so why did you make plans with him?

examples.chinese: 別再放我鴿子，這次一定要來。
examples.translation: Don't bail on me again, you have to come this time.
